prompt: Character: Newborn Mary, Background: Hospital nursery, Relation: Centered, Camera Pose: High Angle, HDR Description: The soft glow of the nursery illuminates the scene as Mary is born, her tiny fingers clutching the air with an inherent vigor.

Character: Young Mary, Background: Grassy backyard, Relation: Wide shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Bathed in dappled sunlight, Mary learns to walk in the grassy backyard of her midwestern home, her parents' proud smiles reflecting in her eyes.

Character: Kindergarten-age Mary, Background: School bus stop, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Low angle, HDR Description: The yellow school bus pulls away, leaving a kindergarten-age Mary waving goodbye, her backpack almost as big as she is.

Character: Mary, Background: Ballet studio, Relation: Long shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary attends her first ballet class, twirling awkwardly under the harsh studio lights, her face flushed with determination.

Character: Mary, Background: Family dining room, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: At her family's Thanksgiving dinner, Mary, in a hand-me-down dress, shyly shares what she is thankful for.

Character: Mary, Background: Treehouse at night, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Low angle, HDR Description: Mary, trembling under the moonlight, bravely confronts her fear of the dark in the treehouse her father built.

Character: Mary, Background: School gymnasium, Relation: Wide shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Surrounded by the glare of the middle school gymnasium lights, Mary awkwardly slow dances at her first school dance.

Character: Mary, Background: Library, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Over the shoulder, HDR Description: In the dusty light of the library, Mary discovers her love for literature, her fingers tracing the spines of countless books.

Character: Mary, Background: Science lab, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary, in the harsh fluorescent light of the science lab, wins the school science fair with her innovative project.

Character: Mary, Background: High school prom, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Under the twinkling lights of the high school prom, Mary, in a borrowed gown, shares her first kiss.

Character: Mary, Background: Campfire, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Bathed in the warm light of a campfire, Mary says tearful goodbyes to her childhood friends before they all head off to different colleges.

Character: Mary, Background: Dorm room, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary experiences her first heartbreak in the cold, sterile light of her dorm room, the silence only broken by the occasional sniffle.

Character: Mary, Background: College graduation, Relation: Long shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: In the glow of a winter sunrise, Mary graduates from college, her face a mixture of excitement and uncertainty.

Character: Mary, Background: Office, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary lands her first job, her face illuminated by the harsh office lights, a sense of achievement reflecting in her eyes.
Character: Mary, Background: Beach, Relation: Wide shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: On a sunny beach, Mary meets the love of her life, their smiles brighter than the midday sun.

Character: Mary, Background: Winery, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Under the fairy lights of a winery, Mary says yes to a marriage proposal, her eyes sparkling with joy.

Character: Mary, Background: Wedding aisle, Relation: Long shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: In the golden light of an autumn afternoon, Mary walks down the aisle, her heart filled with love.

Character: Mary, Background: Nursery, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Bathed in the soft light of the nursery, Mary holds her newborn baby for the first time, tears of joy streaming down her face.

Character: Mary, Background: Living room, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary watches her child take their first steps, the room filled with warm, morning light and joyous laughter.

Character: Mary, Background: Hospital, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: In the harsh light of the hospital, Mary whispers words of encouragement to her sick mother, her heart heavy with worry.
Character: Mary, Background: Cemetery, Relation: Wide shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary, under the grey skies, says a tearful goodbye to her mother, the cemetery cold and silent.

Character: Mary, Background: Home, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary sends her child off to college, her proud smile hiding the emptiness she feels in the quiet, dimly-lit house.

Character: Mary, Background: Home, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary celebrates her 25th wedding anniversary, her face glowing in the candlelight, her heart filled with love and gratitude.

Character: Mary, Background: Garden, Relation: Wide shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Retired now, Mary enjoys a quiet afternoon reading in her sunlit garden, the air filled with the scent of roses.

Character: Mary, Background: Family dinner, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: In the golden light of a family dinner, Mary meets her first grandchild, her eyes filled with joy and wonder.

Character: Mary, Background: Birthday party, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary, surrounded by family, celebrates her 70th birthday, her face illuminated by the soft glow of the birthday candles.

Character: Mary, Background: Bedroom, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Bathed in the soft light of her bedroom, Mary says a final goodbye to her husband, her heart heavy with grief.

Character: Mary, Background: Living room, Relation: Mid shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Mary, now frail, spends her days knitting in her favorite armchair, the room filled with the soft, muted light of the afternoon.

Character: Mary, Background: Hospital, Relation: Close-up, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: In the harsh light of the hospital, Mary takes her last breath, her family holding her hands, their faces a mask of grief and love.

Character: Mary's family, Background: Sunset, Relation: Wide shot, Camera Pose: Eye level, HDR Description: Under the soft glow of the setting sun, Mary's family says their final goodbyes, her spirit living on in their memories.
